name: Immortal inspired helm TYPE.0
description:
Golden helm taking the shape of the owners face, with a long upper portion and layered leather on the side and back, including laminar liked golden pieces.

Inspired by Persian immortals, Immortals were highly trained soldiers with great numbers, if any soldier was slain during battle, another one would be ready to take that soldier's place, hence they were named immortals.

Not much is known about what armor they rally wore but there are interpretations, this piece is also one of many!

May this helm protect you trough hardest times!
